name: VirtualDog
0:
”Alexa, launch my dog”
”Alexa, ask my dog to lick her”
”Alexa, ask my dog to scare him away”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dog
des:
No need to be sad or feel lonely ever again. This obedient dog will lighten up your mood. Make him do whatever you feel like! Unlike the real dogs, it listens to you and it won't require any food (just electricity) nor make your house messy. It helps to keep intruders away! - Try saying "Bark at him" or "Scare him away".

Actions supported currently:
Howling 
Growling
Woofing
Whining 
Barking
Licking
Scaring
Biting

You can say:

"Alexa, launch Virtual Dog"
"Alexa, Ask my dog to bark at him"
"Come on, whine for me"
"Bite him "
"Lick her"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
